locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Math Zero HD
locale.subtitle: Good Math Game
locale.description: This is a mathematical elimination game on a Pad, if your math is great, then challenge the maestro. The method is very simple: through the proper mathematical equation, the result is zero, and let all the squares in the grid win. It's a simple practice at the beginning, and the numbers and calculations will become more and more complex, and if you want to be a real master of mathematics, you need to choose the correct operation order in addition to the correct calculation equation. As long as one of the steps is wrong, you can all be stuck, in which case you can start using the "repeat" button in the lower left corner to try a new correct operation equation and order. Can you be a real master of mathematics? When you challenge, you know, let's download it quickly. Wish you success
locale.promotional_text: The most burned brain math elimination game in the history

keywords.keyword: number,s,brain,pop,star,风报,最强大脑2,小学数学人教版,思维导图,脸书,合战三国,一年级上,虐心,识字游戏,锻炼,口算,简,课本,训练,语文,动画,银行,强大的,app,,帮

locale.version_whats_new: New design, suitable for the latest equipment

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 数学零点HD
locale.subtitle: 好玩的数学游戏
locale.description: 这是一款平板上数学消除游戏，如果你的数学很棒的话，那就来挑战一下数学大师吧，方法很简单：通过合适的数学等式运算，结果等于零，并让网格里的所有方格消失即胜利。 一开始是简单的练习，后面的数字和运算会越来越多，越来越复杂，如果你想成为真正的数学大师，除了要找到正确的运算等式，还需要选择正确的运算顺序！只要其中一步错了，你都有可能卡住，在这种情况下你可以使用左下角的“重来”按钮重新开始以尝试新的正确的运算等式和顺序。 你是不是能成为真正的数学大师？你来挑战了才知道，小伙伴们赶快来下载吧！祝你成功

keywords.keyword: 我要早睡,i,wanna,写歌,看书,火拼俄罗斯方块消除,儿童数独2,加法口诀,罗斯,游戏,六角,康思,趣味,全民,世界,逻辑狗,经典,当,数读,2048,消消乐,俄羅斯方塊,小厨,六边形,点一点,饿

locale.version_whats_new: 全新设计，适配最新设备
